1.content:
The small, rural town of Spring Falls had never been a particularly noteworthy town; but now, it was home to a multi-million dollar investment from an up and coming corporation called "Expansive Candy", who had promised to build their new, state of the art candy factory in the town, offering new jobs, business opportunities and discounted candy to the locals. With nothing to lose, the town's Mayor had accepted the offer, and now, after a surprisingly quick construction, the factory was fully up and running.

After one month, the factory was almost fully staffed, though still recruiting from the local population. Several new "Expansive Candy" stores had appeared throughout the town overnight, fully stocked and ready to start selling.

Job vacancies had appeared just as quickly as the factory; almost two hundred vacancies for the townspeople to apply for. These had included anything from cashiers, office workers and taste testers to engineers and salespeople.

As the factory gears up for mass production, the townspeople are about to undergo a transforming experience...

Okay, first day on the job...and you woke up late.

Having slept half an hour longer than she had intended, Lucy rubbed her eyes, groaned and hopped out of bed. She hadn't been awake this early for months; with her college days over and no job for a while, she was used to long lie ins and waking up at 11am, at the earliest. She could still make it in on time though, if she hurried. The factory wasn't that far away. Lucy ran her hands through her long, red hair and hurried to the bathroom, where she brushed her teeth, washed and straightened her hair. After applying her makeup, she pulled out the first of three new outfits she had bought for work; a black skirt and blue, button up shirt. After stripping from her pyjamas, she slipped into a red bra and panty set and got dressed.

Checking the time on her phone, she was pleasantly surprised by how quickly she had managed to get ready. She grabbed her bag, shoved her phone inside, and jumped in her car. The commute was pretty easy, with a new road built to the factory which hardly anyone was using right now. The factory was nestled deeply between the town's thick forests, and the winding road up the gates seemed to go on forever. Just when she was beginning to think she had gone the wrong way, the factory suddenly loomed over her, and she passed through the gates to the car park.

Checking her phone again, she realised she only had two minutes to go. "Shit! Can't be late, can't be late..." Lucy repeated over and over. She really couldn't afford to lose this job. Not before she had even begun!

Jumping out of the car, Lucy made her way inside and followed the signs to the offices. She jogged up a flight of stairs and dashed round a corner just in time to see the clock above her head strike 9am. As she entered the main office, she was greeted, to her relief, by a smiling woman in purple pantsuit.

"Lucy! We were starting to think we'd scared you off," the woman, Abigail, who looked to be in her late 20's, had interviewed Lucy for the job, and would be her new boss.

"Oh, not at all," Lucy panted. "I'm so sorry I wasn't here earlier, I uh...got a little lost..." She lied.

"Not a problem at all," Abigail said. "Follow me, and we'll get you set up."

Lucy breathed a sigh of relief as Abigail led her along a row of cubicals. Lucy peered at each one as they walked by, noticing that all her co-workers seemed to be women, looking roughly the same age as herself. They were all typing away, mostly looking immersed in their work, though one or two looked up and smiled at her as she passed. Abigail walked ahead, and Lucy realised for the first time how tall she was; she had been sitting down throughout the interview, but looked about six foot now. She had a slender figure, but a strangely curvaceous one, with wide hips, a bubble butt and breasts as large as Lucy's own.

"And here we are," Abigail said. "You'll be sitting here. I've left some training materials for you on the desk, but you shouldn't find anything too difficult. You'll mostly be logging our shipping and distribution figures and producing monthly reports for me."

"Sounds good," Lucy said, sitting down at her new desk. It didn't exactly sound good, but it sounded simple enough, if a little dull.

"I have to get to a meeting now, but let me know if you need anything," Abigail said. "Or just ask Kat."

"Kat?"

Abigail gestured to the girl in the cubicle opposite Lucy; a blonde girl with a pleasantly round face and a rather chubby figure. She was sitting down, but Lucy could see her shirt was quite tight, and her stomach seemed to be pushing against her desk. Kat waved at her, and Lucy waved back.

"Good luck, I'll check in on you after my meeting," Abigail smiled and walked away.

Feeling like she had been thrown in without any real guidance at all, Lucy sighed and switched her computer on. Her company log on was pinned to her computer, so she took a moment to sign on and check her work email, which had a single email welcoming her to the company. She wasn't really sure what to do next...

As her eyes scanned her desk, she spotted the training guide Abigail had mentioned, and was about to open it up, when she noticed she had also been given a small bowl full of candy. "Huh, free samples," Lucy smiled, reaching for a candy and popping it into her mouth. She had to admit, the candy really was good.

Opening up the training guide, she decided to get to work...

1121122111231232311.title: New Neighbour

choices: Lucy decides to explore a little bit...
Lucy checks out the cafeteria...
Lucy remains with Kat and wait for Abigail...
1122.content:
"Anyway!" Lucy's embarrassment at her own lack of self-control passed quickly. "Now that I've finished the training, I suppose I get to work? Or is there something else I need to do? Hmmm..."

Wondering about her next move, Lucy gripped the arms of her chair and adjusted her position, which hadn't changed since she had sat down and was now extremely uncomfortable. As she did so, her thumb just so happened to brush against her belly, Lucy pausing as it did so.

Did... Did my stomach always feel this firm? She wondered, peering over her breasts at her stomach. After her recent binge, she had expected her normally flat midriff to have grown slightly. She had expected a slight curve to it at most, it was only candy, after all. Instead, she found her hands gripping a stuffed potbelly that pressed against her shirt, giving the blue garment a noticeable bulge. O-Okay... Maybe I ate a bit more than I expected...

Even so, the shock at her new belly was brief. She had just finished eating, so given a few hours, it should shrink away to nothing. At the very worst, she'd be left a thin layer of pudge, nothing a couple hours of hard exercise couldn't get rid off. And besides, it would have no affect whatsoever on her work performance! Speaking of which...

Still don't know what I meant to be doing... Lucy sighed in boredom, a curious hand still inspecting her new belly. Wait, maybe Kat knows what I meant to do...

"Um... Kat, right?" Lucy turned to her cubicle opposite her, where the chubby Kat appeared to be hard at work. Upon hearing her name, she tried to spin her chair to face Lucy, only for her considerable gut to stop her. With a sheepish smile, she pushed her chair back and spun around.

"Yep, that's me!" Kat replied happily. "And you're Lucy, right? Gotta say, you've got a serious work ethic! Never seen somebody finish that manual on their first day! It normally takes them the whole week at the very least!"

I had the whole week to finish that stupid thing? Lucy cast an irritated glance over her shoulder at the offending manual. "A-Anyway, now that I've finished it, what do I do?"

"Well, you normally do what Abigail tells you to do," Kat began to explain, one of her soft hands reaching out to scoop up some candy from her own desk. "But seeing as you've finished what she asked... Guess you've got some time to yourself! If you wanted to take a look around, I'm sure she wouldn't hold it against you. Lunch is also coming up soon, and the cafeteria makes some great food. Or you could just wait here for her to her back. She's normally very good at making the rounds, checking up on us, you know? Plus, I wouldn't mind a bit of a distraction..."

Lucy mulled over the options Kat had just presented her with, all of them equally interesting. She had only really seen her office at the moment and, judging by the size of the factory, there had to be more rooms. Though lunch was kinda tempting, despite her earlier meal. And Kat seemed incredibly eager to talk as well...
1122.title: Potbelly Beginnings

choices: Lucy finishes her meal, leaving her even more bloated...
Lucy can't finish, it's just too much food...
11222.content:
"Hmm, I could go for something to eat, do you want go grab lunch with me?" Lucy asked.

Kat looked thrilled to have been invited. "That would be awesome," she said. "Let me just finish off my work here and I'll be right with you."

Lucy nodded and looked up at the clock. It was pretty much lunch time already, but Kat seemed pretty studious and didn't seem to want to leave early. She returned to her desk and shuffled some papers around, not really wanting to start any proper work until she had taken a break. As she sat back in her chair, her hand reached for what was left of her candy. Kat was still working when she looked over, so she shrugged and scooped the remains of the bowl into her mouth, her cheeks bulging with what seemed to be gummy worms.

"You ready to go?"

Lucy hadn't heard Kat approach over the sound of her own ardent chewing, but she found herself looking up at her chubby co-worker, who was standing over her desk, her circular tummy brushing the edge of the workstation. Lucy nodded, her cheeks bulging. "Mmm hmm," she said, not quite ready to swallow.

Lucy got up from her desk, the slight bulge of her stomach still visible from earlier, and began to walk with Kat towards the cafeteria. It was, remarkably, right next door to their office, so the journey was a short one. Whatever they were cooking smelled delicious, and as Lucy followed Kat inside, she could see they were serving Burgers today, and they were gigantic.

"Woah, that can't be all for one person, right?" Lucy asked quietly.

Kat seemed puzzled by the question. "Well...of course it is, did you think they were going to cut that burger in half?"

"It's bigger than my plates at home!" Lucy protested, gesturing to the burgers sitting behind the lunch trays.

There was a round faced, smiling lunch lady serving them, who didn't really look much older than Lucy herself. In front of her, enormous, cheese filled burgers sat on display, ready to be scooped up by the workers, and beside them, sat what appeared to be very sweet looking cakes of all shapes and sizes. Lucy could hardly believe what she was seeing. This was way, way over the top for a workplace lunch.

Nevertheless, she followed Kat's example and grabbed a tray. The lunch girl placed the huge, greasy cheeseburger on top of it, and Lucy, against her better judgement, followed that up by picking a large piece of cake with pink frosting. There was no way she was going to be able to eat all this...

She and Kat crossed to an empty table and sat opposite one another. Kat eagerly bit down into her burger, a soft moan escaping her lips as cheese oozed from the sides and fell onto her plate. Lucy had to admit, it looked good. She drew the burger to her mouth, her jaw barely stretching around the bun, then took a bite.

"Mmm...mmmmf..." Lucy moaned aloud, unable to stop herself. "Man that's a good burger!"

"Told you," Kat said. "The food here is so tasty. Almost as good as the candy...hehe..."

Lucy went in for another bite...
11222.title: Jumbo Cheeseburgers

choices: Lucy discovers more candy and just can't help herself...
Lucy, unable to fight it, dozes off...
Lucy received a visit from Abigail, who bears work...
112221.content:
"Oh, jeez... I'm so full..."

Slumping heavily on her seat, Lucy hid a meaty belch behind one hand and cradled her poor, stuffed belly with the other. She had never, in all her life, eaten something as big as that burger. Each bite had been so tantalizingly delicious that she just had to have another, leading to her eventually gobbling down the entire thing. And then, just when she thought she couldn't possibly stomach anything else...

"Oh, you got the new candy frosted cake!" Kat noticed, excitedly cutting a piece of her own cake with a fork. "You've got to tell me what it tastes like!"

"Urgh, I don't think I could possibly eat anything else..." Lucy groaned in response, both hands now lightly caressing her belly in an attempt to lessen some of the pressure within it. "You... You can have it..."

Pushing the plate towards her gluttonous dining companion, Lucy was surprised to find it swiftly pushed back towards her.

"Come on, it's both your first day of having lunch here and that kind of cake being served!" Kat responded through a mouthful of her own cake. "What if they never serve it again? You'll regret not trying it then!"

Lucy groaned weakly before forcing herself forwards. Her stuffed spherical belly oozed atop her lap, pale flesh bulging through the gaps between the buttons. Yet her attention was elsewhere, namely the limited time cake before her. Pulling the plate towards her, she gripped her fork and carefully cut it into small, bite sized pieces. Spearing one, she lifted it to her mouth and reluctantly dropped it in.

"T-This is..." Lucy chewed slowly, savouring her first bite. The cake itself was moist and so soft, while the icing tasted exactly like the candies she had been treating herself to all day. Despite being stuffed to her absolute limits, Lucy had another piece. And then another. Before she knew it, the cake had vanished, save for a few crumbs and a small bit of icing, and the pressure in her belly had returned, forcing her to slump in her seat. "T-That was... a mistake..."

"Was it nice?" Kat asked, polishing off her own cake. She smiled at Lucy, seemingly oblivious to her plight.

"Absolutely... delicious, urgh..." Lucy managed to moan in response, eyes staring over her bust at her bulging belly. The buttons on her shirt seemed ready to explode off, not that she would complain. The garment was only adding to the tightness around her midriff. "E-Excuse me..."

Unable to cope with it any longer, her sluggish fingers worked to undo a few buttons, allowing her belly to surge forth. It almost filled her entire lap, something that would've shocked her, had she not been near comatose after her lunch. With another groan, she slumped further into her chair, ready for bed. Unfortunately...

"Ready to get back to it?"

Kat beamed down at her, not even fazed by her meal, which was comparable in size to her own. Extending a helpful hand, she helped Lucy to her feet and escorted her back to her desk. Once the bulging redhead was comfortably sat in her seat, Kat returned to her desk, leaving Lucy alone with her churning belly...
112221.title: Jumbo Belly

choices: Later that night, Lucy is overcome with hunger...
Lucy doesn't finish all her work for the day, leading to a reprimand...
1122211.content:
Lucy sank down into her office chair, slouching tiredly so that her bloated stomach was just about hidden from view. Not that she thought anyone would have minded; the other side of the office ranged from curvy to chubby, and each of them seemed to have had an equally huge lunch. Unlike Lucy's flat stomach, however, their larger bellies seemed to have less trouble digesting their meals.

Urgh...all that meat...and cheese...and bread...I need something sweet.

Though she had claimed she couldn't eat another bite, candy was different. It didn't count as real food, or so Lucy reasoned as she spotted her refilled bowl at the edge of the desk. Sitting up slightly, her belly bulging against her shirt buttons, she reached for the bowl, dragged it closer, and slumped back down. Some of the pressure was starting to subside now, so she quickly redid the buttons she had unfastened post-burger, though they were still rather right.

No more lunches here...that's for sure.

Lucy popped a sour gummy into her mouth and returned to her work. She still felt sluggish and full, and it was difficult to really concentrated for the rest of the afternoon, but somehow, she managed. The sugar from the candy balanced out her general tiredness, at least, but she could feel herself losing interest, and all she wanted to do was go home, change into her sweats, and curl up on the sofa.

But that was a few hours away yet, so she tiredly carried on with her work, yawning between snacks and suppressing the occasional belch. Unfortunately for Lucy, her stomach didn't really seem to be deflating as time went on, and her buttons were still pulling tight across her bulging tummy for much of the afternoon. As her eyes started to grow heavy, she forced herself to sit up straight in her chair in case she fell asleep.

With a sigh, she rubbed her eyes, looked around, and decided she needed to take a break. Rising from her desk, she sucked in her belly as best she could, smoothed a hand over her shirt, and walked to the bathroom. Her stomach seemed to churn and bounce as she went, her normally toned, trim abs still bloated and rounding out. Still holding her breath, she let out a gentle exhale as she approached the ladies room, before ducking inside and breathing out.

Looking over at the mirror, Lucy watched her stomach slowly expand back out like an inflating balloon, pushing up against her buttons and pushing them apart slightly. "Ughhh..." she groaned, turning to the side and looking at her food baby. "I feel huge. Stupid giant burgers...and cake...and candy...URRRRRRRRRRP!" The sudden belch shocked Lucy so much that she jumped back a little, covering her mouth with embarrassment.

Turning back to her reflection, she slowly lifted her shirt up, exposing her lightly tanned stomach, which stuck out considerably. She couldn't recall ever looking this full in her life. For emphasis, she pushed her stomach out as far as it would go, then laughed to herself. "God, I look pregnant...ugh..."

Pulling her shirt back down, Lucy went to the toilet, adjusting her clothes, and walked back to her desk, where she sat back down, sank into her chair, and tried to concentrate on her work once again...
1122211.title: Food Baby troubles

choices: Allyson goes home exhausted, with some free samples...
They break for lunch, Allyson samples some candy...
Allyson notices the customers are acting oddly...
12.content:
Allyson had awoken early, ready for her first day at her new job. Since graduating from college, she had enjoyed a pretty leisurely summer; waking up late, doing what she wanted and enjoying some downtime. But after all her money dried up, she had started to get a little bored. She had studied Bio-Chemistry at college, which had completely exhausted her, and she had promised herself she would travel once she was finished studying. She was determined to stick to this goal, so had put off her professional career for the time being, wanting to make enough money to sustain her travelling before getting a "real job".

She was way, way overqualified for the job at the candy store, but the money was amazingly good. This new candy company obviously had great faith in their business model, because they had been offering practically five times as much in wages as any other store in town.

Allyson had been given her uniform, which consisted of a blue skirt, shirt and blazer. The skirt and blazer were dark blue, while the shirt was a much lighter shade, but still, Allyson felt it was a little too much blue. For the money they were paying her, however, she was happy to wear anything they wanted. The uniform fitted nicely, having been measured to her exact specifications during her interview. While Allyson was often complimented on her cute, pretty features, she had always felt that she had quite an unremarkable figure; she was slim, but not skinny, and never really seemed to gain or lose any weight.

She tied her auburn hair in a ponytail and grabbed her packed lunch, a salad. As she stepped into the hallway, she saw her room mate, Sandy emerge from her bedroom, rubbing her eyes and stretching. Sandy had been a friend of Allyson's through college, and had suggested they get a place together when they both graduated. Sandy worked at a clothes store in the mall downtown, but was hoping to get a job as an artist. Sandy was very much a goth; with pale skin and long, black hair that reached down to her waist. She had a nose and lip piercing, and several tattoos.

"Good luck today," Sandy yawned.

"Thanks, should be easy enough," Allyson replied. "Hopefully it's not too boring."

Sandy yawned again. "Just think of that sweet, sweet money," she said. "You'll be out of there quick enough."

Allyson hoped that was true. She was looking forward to the money, but not so much the work. Hopefully, the store would be busy enough that she didn't get bored. She hated not being stimulated or having nothing to do.

---

When she arrived at the store, she entered through the back entrance and saw two of her new colleagues just ahead of her. Unlike Allyson, these girls were wearing green and pink uniforms. They looked to be around the same age as her, and turned as one to smile at her as she approached.

"Your first day too?" The girl in green asked.

"Yep," Allyson replied. She really wasn't great at meeting new people, but decided she had better make the effort. "I'm Allyson."

"I'm Tara," the girl in pink replied. She had short, cropped, blonde hair and a cute face. Her figure was snugly packed into the pink outfit, with the material accentuating her prominent breasts and bubble butt. "This is Carla." She gestured to the girl in green.

Carla was of Latino heritage, and had long, dark hair. Her figure was more curvy than Tara's, though Allyson had to admit to being a little jealous of how good both girls looked in their outfits. Carla gave Allyson a smile and a wave, but otherwise seemed more interested in her phone.

"We're just waiting for the boss," Tara said. "I'm so excited to start work, are you?"

"Sure," Allyson said, with less enthusiasm than she had intended.

The door ahead of them swung open, and a a woman, perhaps in her early 30's, stepped through. She was wearing a blue pantsuit not dissimilar to Allyson's own, and wearing a large pair of thick glasses. Allyson was struck by how curvy she was; her hour glass figure perfectly filling out her uniform. "Girls, I see you have all arrived bright and early. That's good to see! Welcome to your first day at Expansive Candy. I hope you'll enjoy being part of our expansive family. I'm Sarah, and I'll be your general Manager. I'll be on hand to answer any questions you might have, but hopefully you girls will find it simple enough. Let's get to work."

Sarah led them into the main store front; it was brightly decorated, with purple and pink walls on all sides, and shelves stocked to the rafters with all sorts of candy. Allyson found herself impressed by the sheer quantity of products they had on offer, though she found herself wondering whether they had overdone it slightly...was the demand for candy really that high in this town?

"Of course, you all know about the many benefits of working for EC," Sarah went on. "Paid vacations, health insurance, dental plan...oh and of course, free candy samples. You'll find a pre-prepared bag waiting for each of you in the office."

Carla didn't seem to be listening, instead swiping past something on her phone. Sarah noticed this, and suddenly dropped her affable, friendly facade. "Excuse me, Carla, but you'll have to put that phone away. Absolutely no phones allowed on the shop floor."

"Sure, whatever," Carla grumbled, shoving the phone into a pocket on her skirt.

Immediately brightening back up, Sarah continued with her induction. By the time this had finished, she had shown them how to open up, use the cash register, the card machines and where the store room was. It all seemed simply enough to Allyson.

"So, without further ado, it's time for the grand opening!" Sarah said, gesturing to the doors. "Allyson, you man the till. Tara, please stay on the door and greet our customers. Carla, you restock the shelves as fast as you can, can't have our customers wanting for candy!"

Allyson wasn't expecting anything to be restocked on day one, but when she looked through the store window, she suddenly noticed a queue amassing outside. "Huh...looks like our first customers are already here," she said, taking her place behind the cash register.

"Oh, wonderful! They must have got the free samples we sent out," Sarah said, clasping her hands together excitedly. "Tara, the doors if you please!"

Tara nodded and put on her most friendly customer serving face as she opened up the doors. She barely had time to say hello before the crowd outside poured into the shop in a frenzy, nearly knocking her aside. One thing was for sure, Allyson's day was certainly not going to be boring. Before she knew it, customers were dumping handfuls of candy on the desk and thrusting wads of money in her face...
12.title: Allyson

choices: Allyson and Sandy try some of the candy...
Allyson doesn't want any candy, but Sandy does...
Allyson is exhausted and goes to bed...
121.content:
Despite her reservations about the excitement of this kind of work, Allyson's day flew by. The customers kept filtering in to the store, apparently enticed by some free samples EC had sent out to a portion of Spring Falls. Allyson wouldn't have thought people would be this desperate for candy, of all things, but apparently they were now hooked. That suited Allyson just fine; the better business was, the more chance she had of getting paid.

By the end of the day, Allyson's cheeks were aching from how much she had smiled at people all day. Sarah had kept an eye on all the new employees, giving them encouraging pep talks and thumbs ups throughout their first shifts. Allyson appreciated the enthusiasm she had for their work, but her constant cheeriness was exhausting at times. Finally, the doors closed for the day, despite there being a few more people waiting outside, who Tara had to politely turn away. Allyson breathed a sigh of relief, eager to have a rest. Her feet were killing her. She just wanted to go home and collapse on the sofa.

"Well done girls, a very profitable day, all owing to your hard work!" Sarah congratulated them, beaming with pride. "Tomorrow, we'll switch things around, so that Allyson can restock, Tara can be on the till and Carla can meet and greet."

"Swell," Carla said sarcastically, producing her phone from her pocket again.

Sarah ignored the comment. "Now then, I'll close up here, you girls get yourselves home. Hopefully, tomorrow won't be quite so tiring for us. Oh, and don't forgot your free candy!"

Allyson, Tara and Carla all left the store front and walked back through the office, where they saw three huge bags of candy laid out in a row, each one practically half the size of each girl.

"Wow, she wasn't kidding about the free samples," Tara said, smiling. "I thought it would just be a pack or a candy bar or something. These are huge!"

Carla grabbed her bag and headed out. "Whatever, we earned it. See you tomorrow guys."

"Her work ethic isn't that great," Tara observed. "This is easy work for the money they pay us."

"I know, right?" Allyson said. "I guess if business keeps up the way it was today, they can afford it though."

Tara and Allyson grabbed their free samples, said goodnight, and headed home. Allyson found herself being weighed down by the bag as she bundled it into her car. She wasn't even a big fan of candy, but it seemed rude to just leave it behind. When she finally got home, kicked off her shoes and took off her blazer, immediately staggering to the couch and collapsing with a content sigh.

Sandy, still dressed in her own work outfit; a much more casual looking black t-shirt and jeans, was sitting in the chair opposite, watching some sort of true crime documentary. "Hey, how was your first day?" She asked.

"Tiring," Allyson said, laying her head back. "You wouldn't believe how busy it was."

"People like candy that much, huh?" Sandy laughed.

"Apparently so," Allyson replied. "Got some free samples if you want some."

Sandy looked over to the huge bag that had been dumped by the door...
121.title: Exhausted

1211.content:
"What do you have girl?" Sandy asked her friend. Both Allyson and Sandy sat down Indian style near the edge of their coffee table. The auburn head girl opened the bag up and turned it into a faux-bowl. The duo gasped at the collection of confectioneries.

Some were in their own little, smaller bags, each containing three or four candies. Others were single wrapped. And a few of them were in some sort of translucent wrappings.

"Wow!" Sandy noted with actual enthusiasm. Allyson remembered she had a hidden sweet tooth. "She gave you all of this to eat, by yourself?"

"Well she said I could share them with friends..." Allyson waved her hand around for a bit. "So what do you think we should have first?"

Sandy was about to place her hand on a piece but stopped herself. She got up, while Allyson looked at her, and soon came back out of the kitchen.In her hands was a whiteboard-roulette spinner, a novelty toy the girls had won in a college game. She placed it down onto the table and walked back off again. In her hands she came walking back out with eight coloured cards, with some effort, she made room to place the cards down onto the table.

"What's with all this?" Allyson questioned.

Sandy smiled back at her friend. "A little game. we take turns spinning the wheel, and then eat whatever candy is placed there." Sarah explained. She maneuvered bundles of sweets in front of the colored paper. Sandy appeared to be placing them in an order,which was: chocolate, hard, soft, sour, sweet, crunchy, weird,sticky-which was everything but chocolate, and gum. Finished, she sat back down onto her butt.

"Its a game my siblings and I used to do when we were younger. We have all these sweets for ourselves, why don't we have some fun as well?"

Allyson smiled at that suggestion. "Alright, who goes first?"

"I'm pooped." Sandy laid down onto her back. "You go take a whirl."

Allyson nodded and gave a spin...

12112.content:
It landed on yellow, which were all the hard candies placed into one pile. Allyson wasn't much of a fan of hard candies though, she hoped she got chocolate first. The auburn hair girl looked down onto the prone form of Sandy, she appeared with her eyes closed. Allyson wiggled her fingers for a moment and was about to spin again, but was stopped by Sandy's hand reaching out to her arm.

"Nah.Nah. Let me see." Sandy got up and looked at the wheel's arrow. She gazed at Allyson and gave her a quick 'tsk' of disappointment.

"No spin-backsees Allyson, you eat what the arrow tells you." Sandy admonished the girl for what she was about to do. Allyson sighed and looked over her options. She touched each candy and stuck her tongue out in disappointment, not wanting to place one in her mouth. With puppy-dog eyes she looked over to Sarah who yawned as if to say 'not going to work on me', Allyson sighed once more and tapped her fingers down onto the hard sweets.

"What to choose, what to choose." She mumbled.A flourish of the candy factory had given each of the hard candies a symbol to indicate it was such. The name of the candy was stylistically written in a blocky, rigid font.

"Kinda cute that they did this for all of them, makes them both eye-catching and easily place able as a EC crafted candy..."

"Are you going to pick or...?"

"Hold on. Okay, I choose this."

"2HedsRBetrThan1" Sandy mumbled as Allyson held the sweet up for her friend to inspect.The candy looked like cartoon face with another head attached to it.

"Eat. Eat.Eat" Sandy chanted to her roommate who promptly plopped the candy into her mouth. Allyson's mouth bulged,the flavor flushing into her mouth. She rolled the candy around her mouth. The current consumer didn't mind exaggerating her consumption. Sandy sat down to watch her friend.

With a final few lip flaps, the sweet melted into Allyson's mouth, which left her done with the candy.

"Not bad, sour on one side and sweet on the other. Okay you next." Allyson spoke. Sandy was about to start her own spin until she saw Allyson's body shiver.

Allyson's body had grown an extra foot in height, while her shoulder had expanded to allow a slowly morphing stump to form. With a soft pop, a exact replica of Allyson's head had appeared on her body.

The only sound for over five minutes was of the stiches on Allyson's clothes popping open from the stress of her growth.

"Something wrong Sandy?" The two heads echoed.

1212.content:
"Mind if I try some of that candy?" Sandy asked, pointing a finger at the sack by the door.

"Help yourself, not really a candy fan anyway," Allyson yawned, fully knowing the irony of that statement. She hadn't actually mentioned to her new employers that she didn't really eat much candy, fearing it might make them overlook her the job. "I think I'm going to grab something to eat and head to bed."

Sandy was already opening the sack. She reached in and pulled out a handful of wrapped candy bars, sweets and lollipops, then returned to the couch. Allyson went to the kitchen and made herself some Ramen Noodles. Out of the two of them, Sandy usually ate the most unhealthily, but the svelte Goth never seemed to put on any weight, and in fact was a little lighter than Allyson at the moment.

"So, how were your co-workers?" Sandy asked, unwrapping a chocolate bar.

"Yeah, not bad," Allyson said, returning to the couch with her noodles. "One of them seems super enthusiastic and the other doesn't seem enthusiastic at all. They balance each other out."

Sandy's face suddenly lit up as she bit into the chocolate. "Wow! This is seriously good!"

"I guess that explains why people were clamouring for them," Allyson laughed. "I don't think I've ever seen you look so happy."

Sandy took another bite, smiling to herself as she continued to munch on the delicious chocolate. "Ughh...so good...maybe I'll stop by that store myself."

"Well, get there early, the crowd today was ridiculous," Allyson said.

Sandy didn't seem to hear that, as she was busy unwrapping another chocolate bar and popping the first chunk into her mouth. Allyson decided to leave her to it. She stripped out of her work uniform, got into her pyjamas, and quickly fell asleep after climbing into bed.

---

The next morning, after a comfortable night's sleep, Allyson changed into her uniform and headed out. Sandy didn't greet her this morning, which was odd, as this was her early shift at work. Allyson grabbed her packed lunch, a light salad, and headed out the door. As she left, she noticed that the sack of candy was still open, and it looked like it had gone down considerably since last night. Had she looked back at the couch, she would have seen a sea of empty wrappers littered across the cushions.

Soon enough, she had arrived at the store for her second day of work, which she hoped wouldn't be quite as hectic as the first. Tara entered just behind her, smiling cheerfully. "Hey, you came back," Tara laughed. "After yesterday, I wasn't sure any of us would."

Allyson chuckled. "I was so tired yesterday, I fell asleep pretty much as soon as I got home."

"Ugh, same," Tara said.

Unusually, Carla seemed to have beaten them both in. While she had looked completely nonplussed yesterday, today, she seemed a lot more bright and cheerful. As she approached, she reached into her pocket and produced a handful of gummy bears, which she then popped into her mouth. "Morning guys," she said. "You tried any of this candy yet? That stuff is goooood."

"Didn't really feel like it last night," Tara said.

"Yeah, same," Allyson replied. "My room mate liked it though."

"It's so good," Carla said, her cheeks bulging as she chewed the gummies. "You guys should try some."

Just as Carla was about to reach into her pocket again, Sarah appeared from behind her, beaming enthusiastically. "Good morning girls, ready to go to work?"

"Definitely!" Carla said, swallowing her mouthful of gummies.

"That's the spirit!" Sarah said, clearly pleased by the girl's change in tone.

Allyson and Tara exchanged a confused look at Carla's sudden change of tone, but nodded in agreement. Under Sarah's guidance, they all took their places in the store front. Carla actually looked pretty happy on the doors, while Tara looked a little more hesitant behind the till. Allyson, for her part, was pretty relieved to just be re-stocking today. It had seemed like the most chilled of all the jobs. Just go back to the store room and replace what was selling out.

The doors soon opened, and Carla welcomed each customer to the store. Her change in attitude was really quite noticeable. Maybe she had just been having a bad day yesterday? There wasn't quite as many customers as yesterday, but still plenty to keep them busy. The candy really was selling extremely well.

Soon enough, the candy bars were starting to run low, and Allyson went into the back to find some more...
1212.title: Day Two

choices: Allyson notices Carla sneaking back to the store room throughout the day...
Sarah asks Allyson about Carla...
12121.content:
As she opened the door to the store room, Allyson could hear something which sounded like...chewing? She hoped it wasn't Rats or something...

Stepping into the room and closing the door behind her, she suddenly saw the cause of the noise. It was, surprisingly, Carla, who was currently tearing into a large industrial sized box of Expansive Gummy Bears and was surrounded by empty packets. Had she been...eating them all?

"Uh...Carla...you okay there?" Allyson asked, taking a nervous step towards her colleague, who looked like she was in some sort of trance. When Carla didn't reply, she stepped a little closer. "Carla..."

Carla was emptying entire packets of candy into her mouth, grabbing anything she could and tearing it open. She was nosily chewing down on some gummies when she finally seemed to realise she was no longer alone, and froze in her tracks. "Uh...hey...I'm just...doing inventory..."

"Sure you are," Allyson said, trying her best to ignore what she had just witnessed.

She walked past Carla and started to gather up what she needed to restock, ignoring the mess on the floor. She cast a glance down at her feet as she heard wrappers rustling, and realised that practically the entire room was covered with them. Just how much had Carla been eating in here?! For someone who spent her first day so ambivalent her surroundings, she sure seemed to be embracing her role now...

"Please don't tell anyone about this," Carla said, awkwardly cramming all of the empty wrappers back into one of the open boxes. "I only had a few...really!"

"I mean, maybe you shouldn't eat the product, are we even allowed to take samples from the store? Seems like something you could get fired for," Allyson said.

Carla looked very guilty. "I...I don't think we're supposed to but I just couldn't help myself. It's all so good! Maybe just one more..." She grabbed an open pack and upended the contents into her mouth.

Allyson rolled her eyes and returned to the task at hand, gathering up what she needed for the front of the store and side-stepping Carla, who looked like she was still considering continuing her candy binge. "You coming back now?" She asked.

"What? Oh uh...yeah...sure..." Carla said absent mindedly. She folded up the box she had crammed her rubbish into, shoved it under a shelf, and followed Allyson back out.
12121.title: Gorging Carla

choices: Allyson returns home to find Sandy gorging on candy...
The next day, Tara seems to be snacking a lot more on the candy too...
The next day, Allyson notices Carla's uniform looking tighter...
121211.content:
The rest of the day carried on at a similar pace to the morning; with customers trickling in and out at a steady rate, buying what Allyson deemed to be rather excessive amounts of candy. But, she supposed she should be grateful that business was good, even if she was slightly concerned by the sheer enthusiasm of the townspeople for what looked like ordinary candy.

Allyson restocked dutifully throughout the day, grabbing new boxes and replenishing the supply out the front. She had thought that this would be a less taxing job than being on the cash register, but apparently not, because her arms and back were now starting to ache considerably from all the lifting she was doing. It seemed like she was carrying a new box out every five minutes.

Throughout the day, she had also caught Carla - who seemed to be growing ever more excited as she welcome customers to the store - sneaking back to the store room to pocket more candy. Her trips had been pretty quick, and she didn't seem to be indulging in any huge feasts like the one she had enjoyed this morning, but Allyson was still slightly concerned by her apparent candy addiction. Maybe that's why she wanted to work here? She didn't seem all that bothered by the candy yesterday though.

As she looked over at Tara, the petite blonde looked to be struggling with the constant stream of visitors, and was looking ready to collapse at any moment. She was just trying to figure out someone's change while another customers asked her a question about how many types of candy were in the store. Allyson was just about to help her out, when she noticed another empty row on the shelf, and headed out back to grab another box.

By the time she had carried the box out of the store room, Tara had cleared the queue. She caught Allyson's eye, exhaled in an exaggerated way, and smiled. Allyson laughed and returned to her work, noticing that Tara was now helping herself to an opened candy bar she had hidden beneath the register. Allyson couldn't say she blamed her, though she had still yet to sample the candy herself.

===


By the end of the day, Allyson was, once again, exhausted. She rubbed her aching back as she gathered up her things and prepared to head home. Tara looked equally tired; her day on the register having really taken its tole on her. She ran a hand through her cropped, blonde hair and yawned noisily.

"Long day, huh?" Allyson said.

"I feel like I've been here for days," Tara groaned. "Do you think we'll have some peace tomorrow? I can't keep doing this every day."

"Well, I'm greeting tomorrow, so hopefully," Allyson said. "Cash register seems to be the most stressful job here."

As they walked together, Carla emerged from the store room, a large gummy snake hanging from her mouth. She looked embarrassed and pushed it inside as the other girls approached. "Uh...hey..." she said, shifting from one foot to the other.

"Carla, you gotta stop sneaking free samples," Allyson said. "How many times have you been back there today?"

"I can't help it, it tastes so good," Carla moaned.

"Anyway," Tara said, turning her attention back to Allyson. "I'll see you tomorrow, I need some sleep."

"Same," Ally replied.
121211.title: Addicted colleagues

choices: Tara asks Allyson if she wants to hang out after work...
Allyson goes home that night and tears into her sack of candy...
1212112.content:
The next day, Allyson arrived at her normal time to find she was the last to arrive. Carla was already there at her workstation - quite the turnaround from her bored attitude on her first day - she now seemed to be the most enthusiastic worker amongst them. Tara was on restocking today, and walked up to greet Allyson as soon as she arrived, noticeable snacking on a lollipop. '

"Hey, looks like Carla beat us both in today," Tara said, gesturing to the smiling Carla behind the counter, who waved at them both cheerily.

Allyson waved back before turning to Tara. "Lollipop for breakfast?"

Tara blushed. "Oh, yeah...well...turns it this stuff is pretty good. I opened up my supply last night and tried some of the candy. These lollipops are great. You sampled any of yours yet?"

"Not yet," Allyson said. "Not super into candy, to be honest."

"Yeah, me either," Tara said, placing the lollipop back in her mouth and sucking on it.

Sarah entered the room from the back office and smiled enthusiastically. "Morning girls, I must say, business has been booming all week. We're only on our third day and already we've cleared a third of our stock! If this keeps up, we'll be the best selling store in town. So let's try and keep up the hard work until Friday, if we sell the most candy we can all look forward to a nice bonus!"

Allyson wondered what kind of bonus they might get, and, not for the first time, found herself asking how Expansive Candy could possible be affording all this? Though apparently their faith in their product was paying off due to the amount of stock they had managed to clear so far.

She wasn't exactly looking forward to greeting and meeting today, not being the most social person, and being well known amongst her friends for being the introvert of the group, but it did seem like the easiest job. Taking her place at the door, she let the first few customers inside. Once again, there had been a line forming outside about an hour before opening time. These people really must not have had anything better to do.

"Hi, welcome to our store, where the candy is - "

Before Allyson had finished, the first few customers charged past her, ignoring her cheery greeting and hurrying to the shelves. Huh, good morning to you too, candy fiends...

It went on like that for most of the day. Allyson would say hello, and nine times out of ten, she would just be ignored. Carla was, surprisingly, doing very well behind the cash register, acting much more calm and collected than Tara had been yesterday despite a similar influx of customers. Whenever Allyson looked over at Tara, the petite blonde had a new lollipop in her mouth, which Sarah seemed to be fine with. Their manager had not been seen for a while, and was in the back office, so Allyson decided to move away from the doors and have a break. She doubted she would be missed.

Taking a seat nearby, Allyson noticed she had positioned herself next to the free samples; a bowl of assorted candies laid out each morning by Sarah. For the first time, she found herself tempted, and, with nothing better to do, she grabbed a small chocolate from the bowl, unwrapped it and popped it in her mouth. Wow, these are really tasty...that's some good chocolate.

And so, she found herself reaching for a few more, eventually grabbing a handful and returning to the entrance as she popped another three freebies into her mouth, savouring the rich, chocolatey flavour. For someone who wasn't a candy fan, she sure was enjoying these...
1212112.title: Jumping on the bandwagon

choices: Allyson keeps going back for more candy as the evening goes on...
Sandy returns from work and joins in the candy feast...
Allyson starts to feel a little sick, so stops eating the candy for now...
12121122.content:
After what was a pretty chilled day, all things considered, Allyson said her goodbyes and headed home. She was definitely getting used to her new workplace and the rapid pace; though the influx of customers hadn't really slowed yet, she, Carla and Tara were definitely getting used to the system and their stress levels seemed to be dropping after the chaos of Monday.

As she opened the door to her apartment, she spotted the sack of candy she had been given on her first day, still propped up next to the door. Her mind immediately thinking back to the chocolates she had sampled at work today, she was overcome with a craving and decided it was finally time to open up the bag. Unfastening the string that tied it together, Allyson dumped her stuff by the door and leaned in for a closer look; to her surprise, the heavy sack was filled to the brim with what looked like thousands of candies. This is way too much, maybe they expected us to give out free samples or something?

Allyson pulled out a handful of chocolates in purple wrappers with the EC logo on them. They looked a little different to the ones she had eaten earlier, but she wasn't about to go rifling through the entire bag. She'd be there all night! Unwrapping one of the chocolates, she popped it into her mouth and bit down, revealing it to be a caramel. "Mmmmm..." A soft moan escaped her lips as the rich, velvety chocolate melted in her mouth. She looked around for Sandy, but her roommate was obviously not home yet.

Crossing to the couch, she unbuttoned her blazer and tossed it over the arm, before taking a seat and switching on the TV. As she sat down, she was greeted by the sight of a female news reporter standing outside the gates to the Expansive Candy factory.

"Oh, hey, it's us!" She said aloud, unwrapping a second chocolate.

"...and the candy is now sweeping through our town like wildfire, Bill!" The reporter was saying. "To the surprise of local investors, the new Expansive Candy enterprise has brought jobs, interest and tourism to our small town, and it looks like their profits are only going up. Latest estimates show that the five stores across town will soon be restocking completely."

"Huh...I wonder how the others are doing," Allyson said to herself, popping her third chocolate into her mouth and chomping down.

The report cut back to the studio, just as the reporter produced a bag of sour candy from her pocket. "Thanks Sally," the bearded presenter said cheerily. "Well, it looks like all of Spring Falls loves our colourful new business partners. Join us tomorrow when we will have an exclusive interview with the owner of the factory, Miss Elena Exco."

As the TV cut to commercial, Allyson realised she had already finished off her chocolates. "Huh, they didn't last long," she said, looking down with mild surprise at her empty hand. Drawing herself back to her feet, she immediately returned to the sack and grabbed a second, much larger, handful, before returning to the couch and popping one after another into her mouth...
12121122.title: The good stuff

choices: The next day, everyone at work is snacking a lot more...
Allyson wakes up in the night and goes on a candy eating binge...
121211221.content:
As the evening went on, Allyson found herself continuously restocking her candy supply. Each time, she would return to the sack, pick out another handful and return to the couch, but five minutes later, it was all gone, so the process kept repeating itself, and each time, the handfuls got a little larger. She was doing it almost by default now, not really even thinking about how much sugar she was consuming, or the fact that she hadn't actually made herself any dinner yet.

After the fourth trip, she just grabbed the sack and dragged it to the couch, dumping it beside the arm rest and she put her feet up and kept reaching for more. Her hand ferried gummies, chocolates and all manner of assorted candies into her mouth with surprising speed. All the while, she just carried on watching the TV, her eyes taking on a blank, emotionless stare as she digested both her candy and a trash reality show where a group of people had to date each other while living in the same house for a week. She didn't usually even watch that much television, let alone a show like this and would often prefer reading, but tonight she couldn't bring herself to turn it off.

Her attention was finally diverted from the candy when she heard the door open, and Sandy returned from her shift. Looking over at her arm, she found it mid way towards the bag, and pulled it back, surveying the sea of empty wrappers that had accumulated beside her. "Huh...didn't realise I'd eaten that many."

"What's that?" Sandy asked, hanging up her jacket.

"Oh...nothing..." Allyson replied, sheepishly gathering up the wrappers in her arms and walking them to the trash.

"You finally cracked open the candy, huh?" Sandy asked.

"Yeah," Allyson said, dumping the wrappers in the bin. "They're actually really good. They're a bit moreish though, I didn't realise I'd eaten so many."

"Have you actually had any dinner or anything?" Sandy asked, making her way to the kitchen.

"Yeah I..." But as she went to answer, Allyson realised she hadn't. Weird, she could've sworn she had eaten, but now that she thought about it, all she had had since getting home was candy. Though, now that she thought about it, she really wasn't hungry. All that sugar had taken the edge off whatever appetite she had. "Actually no, but I'm good."

"Filled up on candy, huh?" Sandy chuckled. "Careful you don't eat too much of that stuff, it can't be good for you."

Allyson knew that was probably right, but she found herself reaching for just a few extra chocolates before bed. She had been so busy snacking that she had forgotten to change out of her work outfit, and as she returned to her room, she noticed a slight bulge beneath her shirt. "Huh...must have eaten a bit too much I guess," she thought, unbuttoning her shirt to reveal a slightly bloated stomach.

Changing into her pyjamas, Allyson climbed into bed and soon drifted off to sleep...
121211221.title: Growing addiction

choices: Tammy brings in the new products, Lana's first day is uneventful...
After sampling a few of the candies, Lana starts to feel a little strange...
Tammy leaves to fetch the samples, Lana decides to explore while she's gone...
Tammy meets another employee, who warns her to stay away from the factory...
13.content:
Lana walked underneath the huge, multicoloured gates of the new Expansive Candy Factory; the company's logo towering above her in huge, garish, metallic lettering. Geez, even the sign is giving me diabetes, she thought. When she first saw the job advertised, Lana had thought it a very easy way to make some money; she had been out of work for a while now, since the restaurant she used to waitress at had closed down.

Lana wasn't really a fan of hard work; she wasn't lazy, exactly, but she liked jobs where she could relax, take her time and not have to stress about deadlines. So "taste tester" was pretty much a perfect way for her to chill out and earn good money for just eating candy every day. The job was on a two weeks trial basis to start with; and she imagined it probably wouldn't continued much longer than that, because hey, there's only so much candy in the world.

It was pretty cold out, and some snow had landed on the ground as she approached the main entrance. She pulled her jacket tighter across her chest as a cold wind hit her. Lana was wearing a leather jacket and green, flannel shirt with hip hugging jeans. Her time in unemployment had, she was aware, added some extra pounds to her once slender frame, and her once flat stomach had expanded slightly, gaining some added pudge. She was still getting used to the fact that her clothes were a little tight, but hey, at least they weren't making her wear a uniform for this. She ran a hand through her short, pink hair and stepped inside.

The reception staff welcomed her politely, perhaps a little too politely. Must be all that sugar.

They led her down a corridor away from the offices and to the main factory, where she was greeted by a short girl in a bright pink shirt and striped, white and red skirt. Lana was nearly blinded by the garishness of her outfit.

"Hiiiiii!" The girl waved enthusiastically. "I'm Tammy. You must be Lana. Oh my God, I love your hair!"

"Thanks," Lana said. "Matches your outfit."

Tammy laughed a high pitched laugh and linked her arm through Lana's, before leading her off through a large set of double doors. Lana found herself being ushered into a huge, open environment, which to her shock, resembled a large, indoor park, complete with trees, bushes and a flowing river. "Wow, this is like...some sort of indoor garden?"

"Yep," Tammy said, still dragging Lana forward. "We're still adding the finishing touches though."

As they walked past the river, Lana could have sworn the water was brown and gooey, but she had little time to dwell on that before Tammy ushered her through another set of doors and into a very clean, sparkling white room with a table and chairs.

"This is the testing room," Tammy said. Her attention suddenly went to the table, and she raised an eyebrow.

Lana followed her gaze and saw a small lump of what seemed to be marshmellow on the other immaculate table surface. "Am I meant to eat that?" She laughed.

Tammy laughed awkwardly. "Sorry...this was meant to be cleaned up after the last girl...erm...anyway, just ignore that. Welcome to your first day! You got the induction pack, right?"

Lana shrugged. "I glanced at it, I think..." She had not, in fact, glanced at it at all. It was still lying unopened on her kitchen counter.

"GREAT!" Tammy enthused. "We can probably get started then. We'll just be trialling a few of our new candies today. These haven't been tasted by anyone yet, so you're very lucky."

Lana unzipped her jacket, feeling her belly bulge out slightly as she was allowed some room to breathe. She had become very aware of her extra weight, and had found herself sucking in whenever she was around people. For now though, she just quickly took a seat at the table and folded her arms. "Ready to start when you are," she said.
13.title: Lana

choices: She begins turning blue and heavy
She begins turning pink and feeling light
Someone else was brought in and began blowing a bubble; her pants felt tighter.
131.content:
"We call it Super Chew Gum."

"Unlike Mundane Chew Gum." Lana thought.

"The boy's in the lab have been feeling really optimistic about this product, they think its going to take the market by storm." The voice spoke.

"Well you do have 'Super' in its name." Lana joked. A man in a white suit came walking into the room, he held a small plate with a single piece of gum on it. Lana eyed the pomp in the gum's display wondering what was so special about it. She yawned as the piece of gum was placed in front of her.The man soon walked out leaving Lana alone with the confection.

"This is it?" Lana spoke. The piece looked like any other gum she had tried, if not for the fact it was white with the only colored part of it being the company's logo.It did appear a little larger than a competitors brand she noted.

"How many will be in a pack?"

"Marketing is estimating around ten or so sticks."

"Interesting." Lana replied. She shoved the stick dramatically into her mouth before she rested her head on her hand. Instantly a blast of flavor came into her mouth.

"Pea soup, as a gum flavor?" She stated. "People like those weird jellybeans, so i'm not complaining."

She continued chewing.

"Roast Beef. Who likes savory foods as a sweet? Hopefully you eggheads get better at planning." Lana told the blank window. After a few more minutes of chewing,something strange began to occur.
131.title: Super Chew Gum

choices: She begins to float out of her seat
Lana notices nothing is wrong as she continues to expand
Lana tries to leave but finds out her ass is getting larger
1313.content:
"You know what. This is actually beginning to taste pretty good." Lana spoke. "Those other flavors though, bleagh."

"If you'd be so kind, we'd like for you to consume the gum." The voice spoke. "We're trying to do a more 'taffy' consistency than a gum-like one. We liked to hear how it feels going down the throat."

"Odd choice of words,but I'll bite or swallow in this case." Lana joked. She chewed for a few more minutes until she audibly swallowed. Instantly a burst of fruity flavor filled her throat, Lana smiled in delight from the taste.

"Wow. A freaking plus man! That was good. That took all that meaty and vegetable taste right out of my mouth." Lana exclaimed. "So is that all? Can I leave or...?"

"Just a second. We're about to conduct phase two in our experiment and we need you to stay where you are." Lana nodded and took out her phone. She began to play with it for about ten minutes or so until a man came in and politely asked for it. Lana didn't put much thought into why he needed it so she easily complied with his words. Another three minutes passed until a young woman came walking into the room. She looked a little older than Lana, not by much, but their was some quality of her that yelled "senior" in the woman's general attitude.

"Lana meet Christine;Christine meet Lana." The voice spoke. The two greeted to each other a hello before Christine was brought in a chair to sit down in. Another piece of gum, same as Lana's but in yellow wrappings, was brought in front of Christine.

"I can chew this right?" Christine asked.

"Correct, though we like for you to blow a bubble first." The voice explained. Christine shrugged and did so which left Lana wondering what was her job to in all of this. A bubble soon issued forth from Christine's mouth followed by a strange tingle to pass through Lana's bottom. The tingle passed though Lana soon felt how tight her bottom had gotten.

She shuffled for a bit unaware of the processes passing through her cheeks. Her bottom was ever so slowly expanding larger in her pants all the while Christine's bubble expanded larger and larger.
1313.title: Someone else was brought in and began blowing a...

choices: Claire opens an email from someone offering her information on the factory...
Claire decides to check out the factory for herself later that night...
Claire tries to get an interview with Elena...
14.content:
"It's a dam Candy factory, Claire! You really think people are going to be interested in that?"

"It's huge news, chief!"

Claire, hands on hips, stood before the oversized desk of the Spring Gazette's editor, Mr Stone, a heavy set man with a huge, bushy moustache and what seemed to be an ever present frown. They were currently locked in a stare-down, with Claire's piercing, blue eyes fixed on Stone's own, twitching pupils. Stone seemed to be losing concentration, as he always did. He claimed it was because he was always too busy to get into an argument, but Claire knew the old guy had a soft spot for her.

"Fine!" Stone said, his face reddening. "Cover the dam factory story. What's so interesting about it anyway?"

"It practically sprung up over night," Claire explained, relaxing her posture. "That company has bought up property all over town. They seem to be banking on everything being a huge success, because there's stores opening everywhere. There's already six. We're a tiny town, why do they need all those stores?"

Stone shrugged. "Does seem a bit excessive, but people do like candy..."

"Do they really like candy this much though?" Claire asked.

"What am I? An expert?!" Stone snapped irritably. "You are sure there's nothing more interesting you could be covering?"

Claire sighed. "Chief, in the past week, the only other story you found me was one about a dog wearing a hat."

"People like that dog, Claire."

"Yes, chief, we all like the dog," Claire allowed herself a smile. "But it wasn't exactly newsworthy."

Stone sighed. "Yeah, yeah, I know, it's a small town and a slow news week...month...year..." He cleared his throat. "I know you feel like you're wasted here. Truth is, you are. You can do better, and I appreciate you staying on...for now. Okay Claire, see what you can find on. Who knows? Maybe the Spring Falls candy mystery will be front page news this time tomorrow."

"Thanks Chief!" Claire grinned. She turned to walk from the office, but Stone cleared his throat, causing her to turn back to face him. "What?"

"Don't cause any trouble," Stone said, wagging his finger. "I know what you're like. You're an instigator."

Claire smiled mischievously and adopted an innocent look. "Who? Me?" Stone chuckled as Claire ducked out of his office and into the corridor.

She was pleased she had been allowed to do the story, she was certain there was something here. That factory and the oddly successful company behind it gave her a bad feeling. On looking into their past, she had found that the company had been founded twenty years ago as a small time candy shop in New York. They were moderately successful, but hardly in the big leagues. After the founder passed away, his daughter, Elena, had taken over, and at that point, she had somehow managed to turn around the company's fortunes. The shop in New York had been closed abruptly and the company had undergone a huge renovation and restructure.

Claire found it all very suspicious. Samples of the free candy had been sent to some select people in town, but apart from that, it was still not available for public consumption; that was, until tomorrow when the stores had their grand opening. It seemed like a hugely risky gamble to take; what if people didn't like the candy? Was this Elena so convinced of her business acumen and the quality of her product, that she was sure her new venture would be a success?

Claire returned to her desk and sat down, eager to get started. She hadn't mentioned it to Stone, but she already had a few leads...
14.title: Claire

choices: Megan begins to make hissing sounds from his throat
Actually, she's fine, that was until she ate some mentos
141.content:
Megan walked into through the factory's door with open enthusiasm, which quickly slowed as Megan looked around. There wasn't a lively attitude in the factory. No sounds of hustle and bustle or even the creaking movement of workers.Near dead silence. Megan turned to look at the front,a large desk greeted her.With some reluctance, Megan moved closer. On the desk was a single button, the words under it read "press for assistance" in bright yellow letters.

Megan did as the words told, quickly pressing down onto the single button.

"Hello madam." A voice spoke. Megan jumped in shock, she looked forward to see a woman causally sitting on a chair. An unfamiliar phone was held in her hand, the woman looking down at it.

"Um. Hello to you to." was Megan's only response. "Got. I got a job here, this pager I got on me is buzzing."

"Oh. So you're our mechanic! I apolgize for not recognizing you, my name is Cheryl." The receptionist replied. Megan's nerves were calming as human interaction came into play. The two shook hands before Cheryl got up and asked Megan to follow her. The mechanic nodded and followed Cheryl deeper into the facility. Megan's eyes glanced at the various fruits on the wall,it made the factory look somewhat childish.

"You have kids here?" Megan joked. "They like all of this?"

Cheryl glanced back at Megan.

"What are yo- oh, the wallpaper, sorry bout that, yeah you can say people enjoy them."

Megan swore she heard a small "slurp" from Cheryl's mouth but ignored it. The sound of darting feet caused her to briefly turn around, a small shadow passed behind her,which made Megan jump.

"Something the matter?"

"Oh, its nothing." Megan replied. She didn't dare say she saw a tiny shadow run behind her. That wasn't what professionals said to their employers.Finally the two arrived into the cafeteria, which like the rest of the factory,looked empty. Cheryl pointed forward, Megan could see a powered down fountain dispensers like what most restaurants used. Except this one was the twice the size of a normal one.

"It isn't lunchtime yet." Cheryl explained. "You have about two hours to fix the machine or at least tell us the problem.Don't worry, we'll compensate you for an entire day's work even if you don't fix it."

Megan nodded walking up to the large dispenser. Elena had been left her father's vast fortune in his will, and had, much to her detractors surprise, managed to turn around the fortunes of his small, failing company. Elena, with her business acumen, enthusiasm and passion for candy, had taken the company global in only a few months.

Now, the pieces were in place. The first factory was complete, stores opening up around this backwater town and customers eager to get their hands on her product. Elena couldn't wait to see the results. Once this town was hooked, she would move onto the next, and the next, and the next...

Her first choice had been Charlotte, something of a minor celebrity - or as a close as you could get to one - in this town. Charlotte was gorgeous, with supermodel good looks and impeccable fashion sense. She had long, black hair a perfect figure; not quite as curvy as Elena's enhanced frame, but certainly one to make any woman envious. She looked like she belonged on a movie set, not a factory floor. Despite her good looks, however, she had struck Elena as a little shallow and vain. She was mostly just known for being an Instagram influencer, rather than doing anything particularly noteworthy.

Beside Charlotte was a couple who had been invited on the tour together, Jenna and Matt. Elena had chosen them due to their great physical fitness. Jenna was a pretty, blonde girl in her early 20's. She had, Elena discovered, been a cheerleader in high school, and now she was a champion swimmer. Matt, her boyfriend, stood the tallest of the group at just over six foot, and was lean and muscular. He worked as a personal trainer at the local gym, and it showed. He had chiselled good looks, a handsome face and, Elena had to admit, a great body.

Looking like the odd one out was another girl, Sophie. Sophie had been chosen for the tour more due to Elena recognising her potential; she was a chef at a local cake shop, and had won awards for her recipes and designs. Cake wasn't exactly candy, but her creativity with icing, flavouring and sugar had appealed to Elena. Unlike the super fit Charlotte, Matt and Jenna, Sophie was a little shorter and less striking. She was very pretty, with a cute face framed by a thick pair of glasses and freckled cheeks. Her auburn hair was tied back in a pony tail, and she was looking around eagerly.

"Welcome!" Elena said as she approached. "You probably recognise me, of course, but I am Elena Exco, head of the company. You can call me Elena."

Charlotte looked unimpressed. Matt and Jenna smiled politely, and Sophie let out a small squeal of excitement.

"Now, I'm sure you're all eager to get on with the tour, so let's get started," Elena said, ushering her guests towards the large double doors ahead...

15.title: The Grand Tour

151.content:
Charlotte rolled her eyes as the bizarrely dressed Elena lead the way. Why she had decided to choose that weird, multicoloured outfit was anyone's guess, but the girl clearly needed some fashion tips. Charlotte was still a little confused as to how she had even ended up on this tour; the letter with a free "golden ticket" had just randomly arrived in the post for her one day, and it wasn't like she usually blogged or live-streamed about candy. Her Instagram was usually holidays, clubs, make up and fashion.

Still, she wasn't complaining, it was a pretty exclusive invite, and if it brought her a few new followers, all the better. Charlotte had over 600,000 followers on Instagram, a twitch channel and an OnlyFans account where she posted lewd pictures of herself in skimpy outfits...or nothing at all. Her good looks had gotten her very far in life so far, and she usually took in a lot of money from her fans each month. Hopefully, she could attract some more revenue today with her live blogging the tour.

Charlotte had opted to wear an outfit that drew attention to her body today, as usual. She was wearing a pair of hip hugging denim shorts which just about covered her butt, with a tank top that was tied in a knot beneath her perfect breasts, exposing that toned, tanned stomach.

Producing her phone from her pocket of her denim jean shorts, Charlotte held it up and hit record. "Hey guys! Charlotte here, live from the new Expansive Candy factory. Guess who got a free tickettttttttttttttt?" She smiled, showing her whitened teeth.

"Excuse me, Charlotte ," Elena turned around to face her. "I'm going to have to ask you to put that phone away. Everything from this point on is classified."

"Ugh, fine," Charlotte sighed. "You heard the lady guys, guess I'm just going to have to let you know more later, chao!" She signed off and uploaded the video before continuing. She had no intention of just walking around here without taking any more pictures or videos. That would have made for a very boring day...

"Now, then onto the first part of the tour, the chocolate fountain!" Elena declared.

Charlotte followed, alongside the others, as Elena pushed open another set of doors and led them into what looked like a large, artificial garden. Instead of a factory floor, she found herself treading on very realistic grass. The room seemed to go on for miles, and she was amazed she had missed it when she first approached the building. Through the room, she noted that there were trees and bushes that seemed to be growing...candy? Candy canes stuck out of the ground, chocolate bars hung off the trees and candy flowers were growing on plants.

While Elena's back was turned, she quickly whipped out her phone and took a picture, before continuing on.

On the far side of the room was a huge, flowing fountain that connected to the ceiling and flowed into a river which ran through the centre of the room. Charlotte cheekily snapped another picture. She had to admit, it was impressive.
151.title: Charlotte

1512.content:
"Alright everyone,control your appetites,I'll answer any questions you may have." Elena said aloud. She seemed to want to add in the words "we are not children" but left it out in case her bosses overheard. The group all spanned out and Elena occasionally walked over to someone's waving hand.

Charlotte occupied herself by going over to the grove It was if someone took the entire world's fruit supply and made an orchard for them.While there were only one bush,tree,or fern for each fruit, all of them seemed to be ready to harvest. But the fruits that were on the greenery shined a little, as if they were covered in sugar.

"Is this a diorama? Some sort of artist work" Charlotte thought. "Does it matter though, i'm going to get so many hits, oh wait."

"Excuse me, Miss Elena?" The tour guide walked over to the Instagram e-celeb. Charlotte pointed a thumb at the area. "Why are the fruits all shiny? Are they fake?"

"Oh no dear, they are completely edible. These are our 'Candy Fruties' specially made and all around great. Actual fruits that taste much sweeter than their mundane counterparts." Elena explained. "Our eggheads did their best to make a special genetically modified plant that not only mimics all fruit bearing flora, but give each and everyone of them this luxurious gleam. And not only that, but you can eat the skin as well!"

Elena smiled at Charlotte.

"So I can just." Charlotte began to reach over to grab a fruit, Elena interrupted this action with a quick 'tsk' from her mouth.

"No, no, dear. If you want to eat some you'll have to give me a few moments to call in my workers. They'll prepare something quite delectable, but never eat a fruit straight from the branch."

Charlotte nodded and complied, Elena smiled at the girl and quickly made a call to someone, turning her back on Megan as she took the call. Charlotte watched for a few moments until she looked back at the enticing fruit.

"What harm can one fruit do to me? She already said its edible."

And with that, Charlotte picked what she'd stuff into her mouth...

15122.content:
With some nimble steps and quick reflexes, Charlotte paced over to the fruit she had picked out when she first laid eyes on the garden. It was a pear tree that stood proud and high and Charlotte wondered how would she get up to the branches. She scratched her chin for a bit and jumped back in shock as the branch lowered itself down towards her.

"Um..hello?" She politely asked the tree. The branch drooped but didn't react to the woman's voice. The e-celeb took very precise steps until she could reach a hand towards the branch and pluck a fruit off. She jumped back,waiting for the sign that the tree was a sentient being. Nothing came from her theft.

"I better get outta here." She mumbled. Placing the pear into her pocket, Charlotte made her way back towards the outer rim of the garden. There Elena stood tapping her foot up and down,her eyebrow raised as the woman approached.

"Sorry Miss Elena, I was just trying to pick out my fruit for that 'delectable' food you were offering." Charlotte lied to the guide.Unbeknownst to her, Elena knew exactly what she had done. In some sealed off area of the facility, a small betting pool had been going to see what fruit Charlotte picked.

Elena skillfully acted as though she believed that lie.

"Why of course! I do apologize if I seemed like I was admonishing you for your selection." Elena said."Have you've picked your course?"

"Pear." Charlotte replied. Elena nodded at that fact.

"Good choice, well it seems the rest of our little group has gotten enough of out gardens and would like to see where our 'magic' happens. We'll meet at the tail end of the chocolate river." Elena explained. She sauntered off with a smirk, Charlotte shrugged at that fact. With eager hands,and a much more eager mouth, she took a bite of the pear. Instantly her taste-buds were overwhelm, it was like eating pear plus one!

Charlotte's bites became rapid chunk taking off of the pear, which she soon finished in under three minutes. She licked her lips and wiped her hands onto her top.

"Let's go see the rest of this place." Charlotte announced before she expertly hid the core of the pear under some shadowed bushes.
